icp.algorithm.math

Class GradientArtifactDet

  • java.lang.Object
    • icp.algorithm.math.GradientArtifactDet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IArtifactDetection

    public class GradientArtifactDet
extends java.lang.Object
implements IArtifactDetection
    Class for removal of artifacts in EEG signal using the gradient method. The EEG signal is averaged and than each individual point is compared with the average.
    Version:
    1.00
    Author:
    Michal Veverka

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEFAULT_MAXDIFF
      The default maximal difference.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GradientArtifactDet()
      Creates an instance of GradientArtifactDet.
      GradientArtifactDet(double maxDiff)
      Creates an instance of GradientArtifactDet with the maximal difference given as parameter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EpochMessenger detectArtifact(EpochMessenger epochMes)
      The points in the epoch are averaged and than one by one compared to the average.
      double getMaxDiff()
      Returns the threshold (maximal difference between average of epoch values and one point in epoch).

      Sets the threshold (maximal difference between average of epoch values and one point in epoch).

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_MAXDIFF

        public static final double DEFAULT_MAXDIFF
        The default maximal difference.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • GradientArtifactDet

        public GradientArtifactDet()
        Creates an instance of GradientArtifactDet. The maximal difference is set to DEFAULT_MAXDIFF.

      • GradientArtifactDet

        public GradientArtifactDet(double maxDiff)
        Creates an instance of GradientArtifactDet with the maximal difference given as parameter. If the given parameter is lower than zero, then the DEFAULT_MAXDIFF is used instead.

    • Method Detail

      • detectArtifact

        public EpochMessenger detectArtifact(EpochMessenger epochMes)
        The points in the epoch are averaged and than one by one compared to the average. If the difference between the value of the epoch point and the average is higher than the maximal difference then null is returned instead.
        Specified by:
        detectArtifact in interface IArtifactDetection
        Parameters:
        epoch - Epoch from which to remove artifacts.
        Returns:
        Epoch or null.

      • getMaxDiff

        public double getMaxDiff()
        Returns the threshold (maximal difference between average of epoch values and one point in epoch).
        Returns:
        The threshold.

      • setMaxDiff

        public void setMaxDiff(double maxDiff)
        Sets the threshold (maximal difference between average of epoch values and one point in epoch). If the given parameter is lower than zero, the threshold is set to default value of DEFAULT_MAXDIFF.
        Parameters:
        threshold -
